column4: Hey I just downloaded Beryl can someone help me with its installtion I'm a little confused.
Azzclown: I'm a acutally  a little new to ubuntu I"m not really sure what apt-install is
Azzclown: I didn't get it from there...I had to google it to find a download for it
Start over.  Unpack your archive in your home directory.  Enter the directory and ./configure, make, sudo make install.
